profile:
MOST TRUSTED PAINTING & DECORATING COMPANY!
 
We are a full service locally owned Painting & Decorating and Restoration Company with a full service Interior Designer. Budget & Save Painters is dedicated to providing exceptional Painting & Decorating Solutions to residential and commercial clients throughout the Metro Vancouver area.
 
Service Areas: all of Metro Vancouver including: Burnaby, Downtown Vancouver, Yaletown, the West End, Coal Harbour, Kitsilano, Dunbar, UBC, Kerrisdale, Shaughnessy, Richmond, Delta, Surrey, the North Shore including, (the British Properties, West Vancouver, and Deep Cove), Coquitlam area, Port Coquitlam, New Westminster, and Langley.
 
We Specialize in Color Consultations, and Interior Designs for Residential & Commercial Projects, Condos, Town-homes, Apartments, Design, Heritage Homes, Small repair jobs, and Maintenance of painting services!
 
Our Customer Service lines are available 24 hours a day - 7 days a week. We always provide references of our many satisfied customers. We use Top Quality Paints, Primers & Stains! Zero VOC Products - Our Business rating with the Better Business Bureau is A+. Look for our continually GREAT PROMOTIONAL DISCOUNTS - CALL FOR A FREE NO OBLIGATION ESTIMATION!
 
Great reliable painters!
Top-Line General Paint, Benjamin Moore Paints, Cloverdale, ICI Paints & Sherwin-Williams. Other Suggested Brands Offered. TOP QUALITY PAINTS, PRIMERS & STAINS. We use the right brands for each project!
Full Interior & Exterior Painting - Commercial projects and Residential projects - Drywall Repairs -Power Washing and Waterproofing. Colour Consultations - GREAT DISCOUNTS OFFERED!
Most brands supplied - Customer brands on request.
Specializing in Condos, Strata's, Multi-residential, Heritage homes, Maintenance, Tenant Improvements, Additions, Renovating, Changes or Moves & Complete Home Projects. SMALL JOBS WELCOME!
 
Our outstanding services have been catering to a number of locations across Metro Vancouver including Whistler, North Shore, Burnaby, Delta, Richmond, the city of Surrey, Langley Coquitlam, Port Coquitlam and many other outline areas. We are experts in providing exceptional customer service in painting & decorating for our residential and commercial clients throughout Metro Vancouver.
 
We are strong believers in safe (ZERO VOC) paint products and practices that save money, and are good for the environment. Budget & Save Painters and Creative Design offers a full range of luxury paint products.
 
We understand that when we are working on your house, you are inviting us into your home. Trust is of the utmost importance to us; we have an impeccable reputation with many local satisfied customers over the years, and being a fully insured company with WCB coverage, so you can feel confident that the construction process will run seamlessly and efficiently. Some have even gone as far as to say that they have enjoyed the process while working with us.
 
We specialize in Color Consulting, Custom Design/Decorating, Full Interior and Exterior Projects, Renovations, Pressure Washing and full Property Maintenance.

profile:
Bathroom-Design-Build is a family owned and run business dedicated to giving you that custom bathroom look for the best possible price. Through a strict work ethic and exceptionally high standards of practice, founder Paul McGeehan invariably provides uniquely creative, high-quality craftsmanship to each customer. Bathroom-Design-Build values genuine, honest, open working relationships and strives to provide such consistency to all customers and business partners. 


At Bathroom Design Build we take great pride in our renovation process. Your bathroom may look stunning on the outside but what is underneath? The foundation materials of any bathroom are the most important aspects and will be the deciding factor as to whether your bathroom lasts two or fifteen years. Using high quality proven products that will stand the test of time, prevent water penetration and most importantly prevent mold growth should not be compromised or overlooked.

profile: Micom Tileworks has been in the tile industry for many years and i have worked as a tile setter in Europe and Canada.  My goal is to provide the customer with good advice, help with selections and meticulous quality work. The products i use are considered high end products which not only gives you a beautiful result but also a solid tile installation that will last you a long time. I work with all ceramic, porcelain, glass and all natural stone tiles and have a extensive knowledge in all tile applications. My focus is residential work so i can work together with the customer to make their vision come true. Over the years i obtained certifications in many tile, in-floor heating, waterproofing and custom tile showerbase products. That is besides the awards Micom Tileworks has won over the years for great customer service and quality work. Give us a call, send a text, email us at micomtileworks@live.com or feel free to go to the website at www.micomtileworks.com for more info about the company.
service_area: Langley, Surrey, Delta, South Surrey, Aldergrove, Cloverdale, Coquitlam, Burnaby, Port Coquitlam, Maple Ridge, Port Moody, New Westminster, Ladner, White Rock, Abbotsford, Vancouver and so on. We go where we are needed.
products: All ceramic, porcelain, glass and natural stones like slate, travertine, marble and granite. From mosaics and small pebbles to very big tiles.
services: We tile everything from Shower/tub-surround walls, tile shower-bases, all floors, fireplaces, backsplashes, patios etc.  We do all the prep work to get everything ready for tile from tearouts, drywalling the areas to be tiled, new subfloors, AF membranes, waterproofing, and sealers.
brands: We use many brands of tiles but also work with heating and waterproofing products like Nuheat, Thermaflex, schluter products, Redgard, HPG paintable membranes, grout sealers  etc.
specialities: Tiles are our specialty and passion.we have a extensive knowledge in all tile applications and products. With many years of experience complete with European training we can provide you with meticulous work. We only use high end products to provide you with a solid job.
name: Micom Tileworks

profile:
City & Country Contracting aims to be the industry leader in renovations and construction management. Our promise to our clients is to make every effort to take any unnecessary headaches and stress out of a renovation project by ensuring delivery of a quality project on time, and on budget. We work with a number of local contracting and supply companies to ensure we support the local economy within the communities we serve.
.
We believe in Sustainable Construction practices where we aim to eliminate (negative) health and environmental impacts in the construction process. At City & Country Contracting, we work to minimize construction waste and maximize the reuse of materials to lessen the impact of projects on the environment while promoting innovative solar and geothermal energy solutions. Renewable and sustainable energy programs are the key to our children’s future and City & Country Contracting promises to build projects using the greenest methods and materials available!
.
Company Founder- Shayne Finskars
Shayne started general construction by taking on residential renovations in his first home and using his lengthy carpentry and construction experience to conduct the renovations. During this time he gained recognition from family, friends and others over social media for the custom look and quality of these renovations. Many neighbours, friends and acquaintances asked him to take on the general contractor role for their renovations, provide advice or take on the project completely. He gained significant experience and furthered his education in the renovation and building science fields. As a result, he has taken on a number of general contractor projects while supplementing his knowledge through general residential construction course work and supply management research. As a result Shayne has gained a great appreciation for the general contracting process, attained significant knowledge on a variety of construction materials, and developed significant relationships with clientele. The progression/development in modern building sciences, and being able to build beautiful projects have motivated him to do outstanding work. Shayne loves seeing the smiles and joy that people get when they see their finished project and continues to be fascinated by new product lines, designs and ingenuity in construction by always seeking to create beautiful, quality, sustainable, cost effective construction solutions while ensuring customers are ecstatic in the reveal of the final product.
“Delivering excellence through a sustainable future”

profile: Our team of skilled craftsmen can help you with a wide range of exterior renovations including installing new windows and doors, siding and soffit, painting and staining, and heritage restoration. From patio and garden structures to building deck, stairs, and railings, let us create your dream outdoor living space. MASTER SOLUTION will carry your renovation visions to life with more than 10 years of exterior renovation experience in Vancouver and the Lower Mainland. Our expertise is an outstanding renovation process.
products:
Proudly serving the Lower Mainland since 2007, we are a dedicated team of skilled craftsmen with over 15 years of experience in specialized maintenance & installations, remodeling (shelves, storage, decks), carpentry, drywall, and painting. We offer affordable services in Vancouver, Burnaby, North Vancouver, West Vancouver, New Westminster, and other areas for residents and businesses. We customize our service to each of your individual needs and provide excellent customer service with reliable, guaranteed workmanship. We are licensed, and we carry $2,000,000.00 liability insurance.

We bring consistency from construction, design, and decoration from the start of your project to completion, providing you with a unique and innovative style in the market.
services: We specialize in any Interior and Exterior renovations we design & build, whether it's a *New kitchen, *Bathroom, *Basement, *Addition, *Cabinetry, *Flooring, *Painting, *Drywall & Tape,* Plumbing, *Concrete,* Carpentry, *Retaining walls,*Interior & Exterior Painting,* Deck & Fence, *Basement Finishing, *Demolitions, *Complete Windows and Doors, all Including *Supply and *Installation.

profile:
Hi there! Thank you for checking us out :) Here's a-little bit about us, we are a locally owned and operated company specializing in tile, stone installations and home renovations. We are here to help you make your home dreams a reality while ensuring that your project does not become a nightmare. We aim to guide your project through painless and stress free process by staying on budget, keeping our sites clean, being respectful of you and your neighbours, and walking you through every step of the process so you are confident and happy with your project.

We do tile and stone installation for new builds, bathroom and kitchen remodeling and renovations, as well as other home improvement projects. We are also certified to install Dekton and Silestone. Contact us today for your free estimate or consultation or if you have any questions about how we can help you!

To connect with us, call 778-968-0991 or email us at info@postmoderndesign.ca with details of the services you are looking for.
services: Tile and stone installation, bathroom and kitchen renovation, home renovation and remodeling

profile:
Welcome to Prime Kitchen and Bath where we specialize in making your renovation dreams come true! We offer a variety of Home Renovation services including:


Home Additions
Kitchen Renovations
Bathroom Renovations
Basement Renovations
Complete Condo Renovations
Custom Home Building

Prime Kitchen and Bath offers a complete process from start to finish with each project. We start out by a free consultation, followed through with a free estimate. Once the estimate is accepted we then start on the design stage. Once approved by you, the homeowner, your dreams start to turn into a reality. 


Prime Kitchen and Bath has all the right professionals to do each and every job. Hiring the right Contractor can save you thousands of dollars, because the right contractor does things right the first time... Every time. Keeping your project running smoothly with completion dates on time and within budget.


We operate on the best foundation a business can operate on, that is Honesty and Integrity. We stand behind everything we do and everything we say. We guarantee our work and that is what gives you, our Number 1 priority: Confidence and Peace of Mind.


WE PROVIDE SERVICES TO THE ENTIRE LOWER MAINLAND OF B.C. 


No budget is too big or to small. Here at Prime Kitchen and Bath we will work with you on your budget. Please fill in the Request for a Free Quote form if you're interested, and one of our sales members will contact you within 24 hours and set up a consultation.


Prime Kitchen and Bath is a member of the National Kitchen & Bath Association.

Locally owned and operated, with a long history and impeccable track record. To serve our community is the basis of our pride.

Sienna Flooring and Renovation was established in 2009, as an integral part of century Cabinets and Countertops, which was established in 2003. The cooperation of these two companies in manufacturing new kitchen cabinets, vanities, closet organizers, building and remodelling kitchens and bathrooms has led to numerous success stories. We design, install and work on residential, commercial and industrial projects in Greater Vancouver, and other provinces of Canada.

Our services range from designing, installing, CABINETRY, KITCHEN & BATHROOM renovations, COUNTER TOPS & BACKSPLASH installing, ELECTRICAL work, PLUMBING and DEMOLITION
